name: .XTP File Extension
summary: Learn about .XTP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Project accessed by xPlan, a project management application; similar to the .PJ2 and .PJM file; created by the app4mac xTime Project program, which became xPlan; contains project data input such as the budget, project tasks, days off, and task duration.

content: NOTE: xPlan can open the XTP file and any other files associated with the xTime Project application.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
